import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Cart.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { addToCart, clearCart, decreaseCart, getTotals, removeFromCart } from '../store/CartSlice' import PayButton from '../auth/payButton/PayButton' function Cart() { const navigate = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector((state)=>state.cart) const auth = useSelector((state)=>state.auth) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getTotals()) },[cart,dispatch]) const handleRemoveFromCart =(cartItem)=>{ dispatch(removeFromCart(cartItem)) } const handleDecreaseCart = (cartItem)=>{ dispatch(decreaseCart(cartItem)) } const handleIncreaseQuantity = (cartItem)=>{ dispatch(addToCart(cartItem)) } const handleClearCart = ()=>{ dispatch(clearCart()) } return (
{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (
